import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { DatePicker, Space } from 'antd'; const Booking = () => { const [roomTypes,setRoomTypes]=useState([]) const fetchRoomTypes = async () => { await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/lp') .then(response => { setRoomTypes(response.data) }) } useEffect(() =>{ fetchRoomTypes() },[]) return ( <>

Reservation Form

); }; export default Booking;
